EmailTemplate.name: End Of WEEK Email Push - With Promo (Sole P and Existing S Corp)
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to save $300 on Collective Membership - Offer expires Friday at Midnight!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
I want to make sure you don't miss out on this new and exclusive offer! If you join this Friday by midnight, you'll get 50% off the first 2 months = $300 savings!
Use code LASTCHANCE at checkout with this link: {!Opportunity.Signup_Link__c}. Let me know if you have any questions.
Join us as a member today!
Best, {!User.Name}
